Video

A wrapper for the Sky video player, in this example it's embedded onto an image. The video will expand the parent container to fit the 16/9 ratio of the video. CSS changes will need to be made to add text next to play button.
Ensure that you include all the needed dependencies (htmlplayer.js and player css). Check the dependencies tab.
Example: $('#demo-video .video').video({ token:"Your 36 long SkyVideo Token", displayAdverts: false, onPlay: function() { //optional //stuff to do before video plays }, closeCallback: function() { //optional //stuff to do after video closes } });
